TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed IsolatedStorageContainment extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定独立存储区所允许的用途。

span.span: Specifies the permitted use of isolated storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 独立的存储使用证据以确定应用程序或组件使用的唯一的存储区域。Isolated storage uses evidence to determine a unique storage area for use by an application or component. 程序集标识唯一地确定由该程序集使用的虚拟文件系统的根目录。The identity of an assembly uniquely determines the root of a virtual file system for use by that assembly. 因此，而不是许多应用程序和组件共享公共资源如文件系统或注册表，每个都有其自己文件区域本质上是分配给它。Thus, rather than many applications and components sharing a common resource such as the file system or registry, each has its own file area inherently assigned to it. 分配独立的存储时，将使用四个基本隔离作用域：Four basic isolation scopes are used when assigning isolated storage: - `User` 根据当前用户的代码始终作用域。`User` - Code is always scoped according to the current user. 不同用户正在运行时，在同一程序集中将收到不同存储区。The same assembly will receive different stores when being run by different users. - `Machine` 根据计算机的代码始终作用域。`Machine` - Code is always scoped according to the machine. 当同一台计算机上不同用户正在运行时，相同的程序集将收到相同的存储区。The same assembly will receive the same stores when being run by different users on the same machine. - `Assembly` -代码由加密型强名称 （例如，Microsoft.Office.\* 或 Microsoft.Office.Word） 由发布者 （基于公用密钥），通过 URL (例如， http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm)、 站点，或区域。`Assembly` - Code is identified cryptographically by strong name (for example, Microsoft.Office.\* or Microsoft.Office.Word), by publisher (based on public key), by URL (for example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm), by site, or by zone. - `Domain` 的基于证据关联应用程序域标识代码。`Domain` - Code is identified based on evidence associated with the application domain. Web 应用程序标识是从站点的 URL，或通过 Web 页面的 URL、 站点或区域派生的。Web application identity is derived from the site's URL, or by the Web page's URL, site, or zone. 本地代码标识基于应用程序目录路径。Local code identity is based on the application directory path. 有关 URL、 站点和区域的定义，请参阅， ，和。For definitions of URL, site, and zone, see , , and . 这些标识组合在一起，在这种情况下标识应用一个接一个直到创建所需的独立的存储。These identities are grouped together, in which case the identities are applied one after another until the desired isolated storage is created. 有效的组合是用户 + 程序集和用户 + 程序集 + 域。The valid groupings are User+Assembly and User+Assembly+Domain. 此分组的标识可在许多不同的应用程序。This grouping of identities is useful in many different applications. 如果数据存储的域、 用户和程序集，数据是专用的只有代码中，，程序集可以访问的数据。If data is stored by domain, user, and assembly, the data is private in that only code in that assembly can access the data. 按其运行的应用程序还隔离数据存储区，以便该程序集不通过公开到其他应用程序的数据表示潜在的安全漏洞。The data store is also isolated by the application in which it runs, so that the assembly does not represent a potential leak by exposing data to other applications. 按程序集和用户隔离可用于跨多个应用程序; 适用的用户数据例如，许可证信息或用户的个人信息 （名称、 身份验证凭据等） 是独立于应用程序。Isolation by assembly and user could be used for user data that applies across multiple applications; for example, license information, or a user's personal information (name, authentication credentials, and so on) that is independent of an application. 公开确定是否允许应用程序使用独立的存储的标志，因此，允许哪些标识组合使用它。 exposes flags that determine whether an application is allowed to use isolated storage and, if so, which identity combinations are allowed to use it. 它还确定是否允许应用程序使用 （必须配置 Windows 漫游用户配置文件或文件夹重定向） 的用户可以漫游的位置中存储的信息。It also determines whether an application is allowed to store information in a location that can roam with a user (Windows Roaming User Profiles or Folder Redirection must be configured). ## Examples 此示例演示如何告知 CLR 在此程序集中的代码需要并且还演示如何编写和读取独立存储中。This example shows how to tell the CLR that code in this assembly requires the and also demonstrates how to write and read from isolated storage. [!code-cpp[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/cpp/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/CS/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment AdministerIsolatedStorageByUser = int32(112)
AdministerIsolatedStorageByUser = 112

summary.span: 对用户存储区的无限制的管理能力。

span.span: Unlimited administration ability for the user store.

summary.span: 允许浏览和删除整个用户存储区，但除用户自己的域/程序集标识外，不允许进行读访问。

span.span: Allows browsing and deletion of the entire user store, but not read access other than the user's own domain/assembly identity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment ApplicationIsolationByMachine = int32(69)
ApplicationIsolationByMachine = 69

summary.span: 存储首先按计算机隔离，然后按应用程序隔离。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by computer and then by application.

summary.span: 这为在任何域上下文中均可访问的应用程序提供了数据存储区。

span.span: This provides a data store for the application that is accessible in any domain context.

summary.span: 基于应用程序的数据隔离舱需要额外的信任，原因是数据隔离舱可能会在应用程序之间提供“隧道”，从而危及特定网站中应用程序的数据隔离。

span.span: The per-application data compartment requires additional trust because it potentially provides a "tunnel" between applications that could compromise the data isolation of applications in particular Web sites.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment ApplicationIsolationByRoamingUser = int32(101)
ApplicationIsolationByRoamingUser = 101

summary.span: 存储首先按用户隔离，然后按应用程序证据隔离。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by application evidence.

summary.span: 当启用 Windows 用户数据漫游时，存储将漫游。

span.span: Storage will roam if Windows user data roaming is enabled.

summary.span: 这为在任何域上下文中均可访问的应用程序提供了数据存储区。

span.span: This provides a data store for the application that is accessible in any domain context.

summary.span: 基于应用程序的数据隔离舱需要额外的信任，原因是数据隔离舱可能会在应用程序之间提供“隧道”，从而危及特定网站中应用程序的数据隔离。

span.span: The per-application data compartment requires additional trust because it potentially provides a "tunnel" between applications that could compromise the data isolation of applications in particular Web sites.

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by application.

span.span: Storage is also isolated by computer.

AssemblyIsolationByMachine = 64

summary.span: 存储首先按计算机隔离，然后按代码程序集隔离。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by computer and then by code assembly.

summary.span: 这为在任何域上下文中都可访问的程序集提供了数据存储区。

span.span: This provides a data store for the assembly that is accessible in any domain context.

summary.span: 基于程序集的数据室需要额外的信任，因为它可能在应用程序之间提供“隧道”，该隧道会危及特定网站中应用程序的数据隔离。

span.span: The per-assembly data compartment requires additional trust because it potentially provides a "tunnel" between applications that could compromise the data isolation of applications in particular Web sites.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment DomainIsolationByMachine = int32(48)
DomainIsolationByMachine = 48

summary.span: 存储首先按计算机隔离，然后按域和程序集隔离。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by computer and then by domain and assembly.

summary.span: 只有在相同应用程序的上下文内并且仅在相同的计算机上运行时，才可访问数据。

span.span: Data can only be accessed within the context of the same application and only when run on the same computer.

summary.span: 这在第三方程序集想要保留私有数据存储区时很有用。

span.span: This is helpful when a third-party assembly wants to keep a private data store.

summary.span: 不允许使用独立存储。

span.span: Use of isolated storage is not allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment UnrestrictedIsolatedStorage = int32(240)
UnrestrictedIsolatedStorage = 240

summary.span: 允许在没有任何限制的情况下使用独立存储。

span.span: Use of isolated storage is allowed without restriction.

summary.span: 代码对用户存储区的任何部分均有完全访问权限，而不管域或程序集的标识如何。

span.span: Code has full access to any part of the user store, regardless of the identity of the domain or assembly.

summary.span: 独立存储的这种使用允许对独立存储数据存储区中的内容进行枚举。

span.span: This use of isolated storage includes the ability to enumerate the contents of the isolated storage data store.
